```{r setup}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = paste0(own_path, "/group_04_project/data/"))
```

## Load Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Fetch dataset

```{r}
mRNA_log_long_full <- readRDS(paste0(own_path, "/group_04_project/data/miRNA_log_long_full.RDS"))
```

## Experiment description

Number of patients (cancer/normal)

```{r}
ggplot(collapsed_data, aes(x = ajcc_pathologic_stage)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(x = "Categories", y = "Frequency", title = "Frequency of Cases by Category") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1))
```

Gender distribution

```{r}
collapsed_data <- mRNA_log_long_full |>
  distinct(TCGA_ID, .keep_all = TRUE) |>
  mutate(age_at_index = as.numeric(age_at_index))

ggplot(collapsed_data, aes(x = gender, y = age_at_index, fill = gender)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(x = "Gender", y = "Age", title = "Distribution of Age by Gender")
```

Cancer stages

```{r}
ggplot(collapsed_data, aes(x = ajcc_pathologic_stage, fill = ajcc_pathologic_stage)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(x = "AJCC Pathologic Stage", y = "Frequency", title = "Frequency of AJCC Pathologic Stages by Status") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank())
```
